name: Universes Collide - Choose your own Adventure
name_original: Universes Collide - Choose your own Adventure
description:
First chapter of Universes Collide, in this adventure you will go on a 30 day journey with your friends to Connecticut, on the journey you will make important choices and will determine your fate, and will find strange portals to other worlds, in the first chapter you can participate in an epic fight with toads, or get thrown in jail, Second chapter coming soon! 

Second chapter contains character development, strange portals and secret codes, and battles! Coming soon
